DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness and side effects of LY293111 given in combination with gemcitabine and cisplatin in patients with non-small cell lung cancer.
DOC.brief_title: A Study With Gemcitabine, Cisplatin, and LY293111 in Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: NonSmall Cell Lung Cancer, Stage IIIB or IV that is not amenable to either surgery of curative intent or radiation therapy Tumor that can be measured by xray or scan Adequate organ function Inability to swallow capsules Documented brain metastases Prior chemotherapy or biological therapy for this disease
